titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z104: Ketubah.

notesStmt.note: The ketubbah contains the date 1900, presumably to the Seleucid era [1658]. The document more likely dates to the 19th century.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
